properties.Name: Rock Bottom Restaurant & Brewery
properties.Open: Sun-Tues 11 am-midnight; Wed-Thurs 11 am-1 am; Fri-Sat 11 am-2 am
properties.Directions: Take exit for Ballston M (Metro) approx .2 mi, then left on Fairfax Dr, right on Glebe Rd, continue across Wilson Blvd .2 mi (premises face Glebe Rd)

properties.Name: Sehkraft Beer Garden and Haus (opening 2015)
properties.Open: (proposed) open daily, hours to be determined
properties.Directions: Eastbound: at mile marker 2 exit onto N Lincoln St, go south, then left on N 14th St, right on Lynnbrook Dr, left on 13th St, right on Kirkwood Rd for about .2 mi, left on N 10th St for about .3 mi to N Garfield St. Westbound: just past mile marker 3 take N Calvert St exit, go .2 mi, then right on Lee Hwy, left on N Danville St, right on N 18th St, left on N Edgewood St, right on Key Blvd, left on N Fillmore, follow for .5 mi, then right on N 10th St and right on N Garfield St
